definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing

sentences.english: But he made no mention of closing Guantánamo Bay.
sentences.chinese: 但他沒有提到要關閉“關塔那摩灣”。

sentences.english: That is why I ordered the prison at Guantanamo Bay closed.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我下令關閉關塔那摩灣監獄的原因。

sentences.english: I was an interrogator at the detention facility in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
sentences.chinese: 我曾是一位古巴關塔那摩灣拘留所的審訊官。

sentences.english: But the idea of housing Gitmo prisoners here just floors me.
sentences.chinese: 但是收容關塔那摩灣罪犯的想法就擊倒了我。
